tool.name: BDSS

param.name: manifest
param.label: Data URLs
param.help: Download data by entering URLs in this box (one URL per line).

param.name: maxprocs
param.label: Max number of parallel processes
param.help: The tool will download data using up to this number of parallel processes.

tool.help:
.. class:: warningmark
Files downloaded using this tool will not automatically appear in the history. You must manually refresh your history after the job completes to see downloaded files.
